    • Method Detail

      • getURLRaw

        java.lang.String getURLRaw(java.lang.String strURL)
        This function instantiates a StringBuilder object, strConten,t that holds the content of a web page. It instaniates a URL object, myWebAddress, to hold the web URL string. It instantiates an InputStream object, myStrIn, in order to read from an internet stream of data. It instantiates a BufferedReader object, myINputFile, in order to read the URL.
        Parameters:
        strURL - a string representing the webpage URL address
        Returns:
        a string representing what is on the webpage at the URL address

      • getPREData

        java.lang.String getPREData(java.lang.String strPage)
        This function converts calls getRegEx and hands it a page of data to be searched with a pattern argument string
        Parameters:
        strPage - a string representing the data we must search through
        Returns:
        a string representing the data we searched for

      • getRegEx

        java.lang.String getRegEx(java.lang.String strInput,
                        java.lang.String strPattern)
        This function uses regular expressions in order to search for patterns in text strings.
        Parameters:
        strInput - a string representing the data to be searched
        strInput - a string representing the pattern to search by
        Returns:
        a string representing the important data we searched for

      • properCase

        java.lang.String properCase(java.lang.String strInput)
        This function converts string data to proper case formate. Such as the name: "ProperCase"
        Parameters:
        strInput - a string representing the data to be converted to proper case
        Returns:
        a string shown in proper case format

      • saveToFile

        void saveToFile(java.lang.String strFileName,
              java.lang.String strContent)
        This function creates a file, and saves an input string to that file
        Parameters:
        strFilename - a string representing the file we want to be created
        strContent - a string representing the content we want to saved in the file

      • getFromFile

        java.lang.String getFromFile(java.lang.String strFileName)
        This function reads a file and returns it's contents as a string
        Parameters:
        strFileName - a string representing the name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        a string representing the contents of the file
